item.title: Emergent Communication Part 2: History
item.description:
Wittgenstein #

Any good review of Emergent Communication would be lacking if it didn’t mention the “greatest philosopher of the 20th Century” Ludvig Wittgenstein.

Signalling Games #

Language Emergence #

Deep Learning #

item.title: Emergent Communication: The What and The Why
item.description: For the past two years, I have been fascinated by the field of emergent communication; I even made it the topic of my master’s thesis. This year, I am helping organize the event that sparked my interest: the emergent communication workshop at NeurIPS. To give others a look into the field (and also to make my thesis writing more fun), I will be writing a series of blog posts on emergent communication that are meant to be accessible and interesting. I’m hoping to communicate some of the magic that has captivated me.
